name: ThreatMiner API
description: This app integrates with the ThreatMiner API to provide investigation activities

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
Check for the presence of a domain in a threat intelligence feed

example_values: Domain: www.Threatminer.com, Status message: Results found.

actions.description: Check for the presence of a hash in a threat intelligence feed

hash_type.description: Cryptographic Hash, Imphash or SSDEEP to lookup

example_values: Status message: Results found, Hash: fa101bee034e93a1fa8e8f08d1bf76e7

actions.description: Check for the presence of an IP in a threat intelligence feed

example_values: Ip: 1200:0000:AB00:1234:0000:2552:7777:1313, Status message: No results found

actions.description: Execute whois lookup on the given domain

example_values: Domain: "www.Threatminer.com","Threatminer.com", Status message: No results found.

actions.description: Find domain names that share an IP
Execute whois lookup on the given IP address

example_values: Domain: 1200:0000:AB00:1234:0000:2552:7777:1313, Status message: No results found.

actions.verbose: Lookup AV string to find known hashes. For example you can lookup 'Trojan.Enfal'

av_string.description: The detection name from the AV vendor

example_values: Av string: test, Status message: Results found

actions.verbose: Lookup an SSL thumbprint against ThreatMiner API and return known IP addresses associated with that same SSL certificate

example_values: Status message: No results found, Thumbprint: 42a8d5b3a867a59a79f44ffadd61460780fe58f2&rt=1
